raw_body: NETHTHIKUMARA RANJITH SRILAL FONSEKA – Beloved husband of Srimathie (ex UNESCO France),​ much loved father of late Srinath,​ Srinath,​ Srimalie,​ late Srimal and Srilal Junior,​ much loved father-in-law of Gregory Caron and Sam Fernandoz (Australia),​ beloved grandfather of Catherine,​ Charlize and Augustine,​ passed away peacefully in Sri Lanka. Remains lie at “The Respect” Jayarathne Parlour Bauddhaloka Mawatha from 10 a.m. on 26th September and Cremation 5 p.m. at General Cemetery Kanaththa,​ Borella on 27th Setember. 0777683672.061066
